title: Patricia Bullrich | AS/COA
snippet: Antes de su rol actual, Bullrich se desempeñ como Ministra de Seguridad de la Nación durante la administración 2015-2019. Su extensa carrera política incluye haber sido diputada nacional por la Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires de 2007 a ...

title: Patricia Bullrich - Wikipedia
snippet: She currently serves as a National Senator for the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires since December 2025, representing La Libertad Avanza. She previously served as the Minister of National Security from 2023 to 2025 under president Javier Milei and from 2015 to 2019 under president Mauricio Macri.

title: Patricia Bullrich confirmed as security minister of Milei government - Buenos Aires Herald
snippet: Patricia Bullrich will be Javier Milei’s security minister, the president-elect’s press team announced in a release posted Friday morning on the website X.

title: Patricia Bullrich
snippet: Patricia Bullrich (born 11 June 1956) is an Argentine politician serving as Minister of Security since December 2023 under President Javier Milei. She previously occupied the same role from 2015 to 2019 during Mauricio Macri's presidency, where ...

title: Bullrich resigns as security minister to take up Senate seat | Buenos Aires Times
snippet: Upon his inauguration, Milei appointed Bullrich to the security minister post, a position she had previously serviced in former president Mauricio Macri’s 2015-2019 government.
